law.catch_line: Districts may cooperate with one another.
law.text: The boards of any two (2) or more districts may cooperate with one another in the exercise of any or all powers conferred in this chapter.
law.history: Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 42i-13.
